meanings.definition: To break up or dissolve (a group or organization)
meanings.sent1: The team is disbanding after the final game.
meanings.sent2: The government decided to disband the committee.
meanings.sent3: The ants are disbanding their line and going in different directions.
meanings.sent4: The music festival is disbanding, leaving memories of joy behind.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick involved disbanding the cards and then reassembling them.

meanings.definition: The act of disbanding or being disbanded
meanings.sent1: The disbanding of the band left fans disappointed.
meanings.sent2: The disbanding of the club was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The disbanding of the party led to a spontaneous dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The disbanding of the team felt like the end of an era.
meanings.sent5: The disbanding of the group was met with mixed emotions.
